keys: curva de la fuerza-separacio'n de las moléculas

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_22bd2b4f6e64ea0eb3c35ac650ed2d7513142906</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Ball-bearing model of solids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ball-bearingmodell der Körper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Modèle de roulement à billes des solides</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Modelo do ball-bearing dos sólidos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modello del ball-bearing dei solidi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μοντέλο ρουλεμάν των στερεών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Modelo del rodamiento de bolas de sólidos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration is a representation of the ball-bearing model showing how atoms pack together in solids. The model shows the grain boundaries, vacancies and dislocations that can arise in a polycrystalline material.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">attractive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules force-separation curve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsive force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung ist eine Darstellung der 
vorbildlichen Vertretung des Ball-bearing, wie Atome zusammen in den 
Körpern packen. Das Modell zeigt die Kristallgrenzen, die 
freien Stellen und die Versetzungen, die in einem polykristallinen 
Material entstehen können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration est une représentation de 
l'apparence modèle de roulement à billes comment les atomes 
emballent ensemble en solides. Le modèle montre les bornes de 
grain, les vacances d'emploi et les dislocations qui peuvent surgir 
dans un matériel polycristallin.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração é uma respresentação da 
exibição modelo do ball-bearing como os átomos embalam junto nos 
sólidos. O modelo mostra os limites de grão, as vacâncias e 
os dislocations que podem se levantar em um material polycrystalline.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione è una rappresentazione 
della rappresentazione di modello del ball-bearing come gli atomi 
imballano insieme in solidi. Il modello mostra i contorni di 
grano, i posti vacanti e le dislocazioni che possono presentare in un 
materiale policristallino.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση είναι μια αντιπροσώπευση του 
ρουλεμάν πρότυπου που επιδεικνύει πώς τα άτομα συσκευάζουν μαζί
στα στερεά. Το μοντέλο εμφανίζει τα όρια, τα κενά και 
εξαρθρώσεις σιταριού που μπορούν να προκύψουν σε ένα 
πολυκρυσταλλικό υλικό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración es una representación de la 
demostración modelo del rodamiento de bolas cómo los átomos pila de
discos juntos en sólidos. El modelo muestra los límites de 
grano, las vacantes y las dislocaciones que pueden presentarse en un 
material polycrystalline.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">attraktive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Moleküle Kraft-Trennung Kurve</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">repulsive Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force attrayante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">courbe de force-séparation de molécules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force répulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força atrativa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">curva da força-separação das moléculas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza attraente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">curva di forza-separazione delle molecole</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza repulsive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ελκυστική δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καμπύλη δύναμη-χωρισμού μορίων</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">curva de la fuerza-separacio'n de las moléculas</string>
          </keyword>
